nodes.text: The Moorsh Moraine was a glacial feature located on the planet Hoth. Prior to the Battle of Hoth, the Imperial Army used the moraine as a staging area while numerous Gozanti-class cruisers ferried Imperial personnel towards the planet.

The Moorsh Moraine was first mentioned in the Legends source-book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars Trilogy and made its first appearance in Entrenched, a Legends comic. The moraine was confirmed to be canon when it was mentioned in the 2014 mobile-game Star Wars: Galactic Defense.
